verses.1: Tua ciangin Jonah in tua ngapiʼ gil sung panin Topa a Pasian kiangah thu ngen a,
verses.2: “Ka cihmawhna panin Topa ka sam a, amah in kei hong dawng hi. Sihna gam Sheol panin kong kiko a, nangmah in ka aw nong za hi.
verses.3: Tuipi thuk sungah kei nong khia a, tui in kei hong tuumcip hi. Na tuihualte khempeuh in kei hong tum hi.
verses.4: Tua ciangin keimah in, ‘Na omna panin kei hong kihawl khia hi. Na biakinn siangtho hong koici etkik thei ding ka hi hiam?’ ka ci hi.
verses.5: Tui in kei hong tuamcip a, ka kimkot ah hong umcih hi. Tuipi tunga lopate in ka lu hong vialcip hi.
verses.6: Mualteʼ bul tuipi taw dong ka va pai suk a, kong hong kikhaknelh tawntungna mun ka tun hangin tua Leihawmpi sung panin a nungta-in nong la to veve hi, Topa ka Pasian aw.
verses.7: Kei ka lung a kiat ciangin Topa kong phawk a, ka thungetna, na biakinn siangtho sung, nangma kiang hong tung hi.
verses.8: Kimanna a nei lo milim a biate in nangmah hong taisan uh hi.
verses.9: Ahih hangin keʼn ahihleh lungdamna aw tawh biakna kong pia dinga, ka ciam sa thu ka tangtungsak ding hi. Topaʼ kiang pan hotkhiatna hong pai hi,” a ci hi.
verses.10: Tua ciangin Topa in tua ngapi sawl a, amah in lei keu tungah Jonah a lua khia hi.
